mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, EMAIL, NICKNAME, USERBANNED, JOINDATE FROM USERINFO WHERE USERBANNED > 5 ORDER BY rownum desc

SELECT ROWNUM, P.PARTYNAME, I.NICKNAME, P.PARTYBANNED, P.CREATEDATE FROM PARTY P JOIN PARTYUSER U ON P.PARTYCODE = U.PARTYCODE JOIN USERINFO I ON U.EMAIL = I.EMAIL WHERE P.PARTYBANNED > 5 AND U.AUTHCODE = 2 ORDER BY rownum desc
